entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
